title: New: Tay Iwar – Zion Wolf (Jai Paul Cover)
body:
It’s April, you know what that means, right? #JaiPril.

But seriously… this cover/rework of Jai Paul’s leaked Track 3 (rumoured title Zion Wolf) by Nigeria’s **Tay Iwar** is absolute fire. So it obviously owes a decent amount to the original genius of Jai Paul, but imagine if Drake had covered a track, instead of just jumping on the BTSU beat, and you get the vibe of it. Adding his own verse, whilst keeping the beat much the same, it’s inspired. Check it out below, and [here’s more](https://soundcloud.com/bantucollective/sets/tay-passport-mixtape) from Tay Iwar while you’re at it. (Original below for reference)

[zion wolf – jai paul](https://vimeo.com/80195527) from [yae](https://vimeo.com/user22954774) on [Vimeo](https://vimeo.com).
